de.hshl.obj.wavefront.mtl

Class MTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshl.obj.wavefront.mtl.MTL

  • public final class MTL
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Material Library file. Acts as Builder to a Parser.
    Author:
    Johannes Vollmer
    See Also:
    TriangularOBJBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MTL(Resource resource) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Material> getMaterials()
      Returns the list of Materials which have already been found in the file.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Material> getMaterialsByName()
      Returns a HashMap of the Materials which have already been found in the file, prepared for faster access by material name.
      Resource getResource()
      Returns the source MTL file.
